region.title: AWS Region
region.description: AWS Region of the SQS Queue

delete_messages.title: Delete Messages After Read
delete_messages.description: If Enabled, messages will be deleted from the SQS Queue after being read. If Disabled, messages are left in the queue and can be read more than once.

max_batch_size.title: Max Batch Size
max_batch_size.description: Max amount of messages to get in one batch (10 max)

max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time
max_wait_time.description: Max amount of time in seconds to wait for messages in a single poll (20 max)

attributes_to_return.title: Message Attributes To Return
attributes_to_return.description: Comma separated list of Mesage Attribute names to return

visibility_timeout.title: Message Visibility Timeout
visibility_timeout.description: Modify the Visibility Timeout of the individual message from the Queue's default (seconds).

access_key.title: AWS IAM Access Key ID
access_key.description: The Access Key ID of the AWS IAM Role to use for pulling messages

secret_key.title: AWS IAM Secret Key
secret_key.description: The Secret Key of the AWS IAM Role to use for pulling messages
